layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x124
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x124
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x92
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20 [color=#000080]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 215x19
          text run at (0,0) width 215: "This sentence should be in italics. "
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 203x19
          LayoutText {#text} at (215,0) size 203x19
            text run at (215,0) width 203: "This sentence should be normal."
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,36) size 784x20 [color=#000080]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 205x19
          text run at (0,0) width 205: "This sentence should be oblique."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,72) size 784x20 [color=#000080]
        LayoutInline {I} at (0,0) size 203x19
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 203x19
            text run at (0,0) width 203: "This sentence should be normal."
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
